title: In Vino Veritas
description:
"In Vino Veritas" was Karen Chance's contribution to the 
Chicks Kick Butt
 anthology (June 2011). It is now available on her website as a free short as per the contract with the publisher. Contains spoilers for Midnight's Daughter, Dorina Basarab #1 and Death's Mistress, Dorina Basarab #2.
author: Karen Chance
